attributes.action: A5 - Tebworth Road Installation of Traffic Lights
attributes.additional_details:
My daughter and I were recently involved in a fatal road traffic collision at the A5 - Tebworth Road junction.
We feel that due to the amount of traffic that flows through this area of the A5 every day, the amount of collisions both minor to fatal that happen at this junction, something needs to change. I would like to propose traffic lights at this junction to slow traffic through the hockliffe area of the A5 which I feel would prevent any more fatalities
